question_sets.name: Mannheim Function Calling Benchmark: Questions w/ Single Parameters, One Step and One Shot
question_sets.description: Simple, single step questions designed to test a subset of selection of records, interpretation, reasoning, different languages, typos, related and unrelated context

questions.question: Among the top 30 rated albums, which were released by 'Radiohead'?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (string matching).

questions.question: Which songs released in 2012 were performed by more than 1 artist?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (integer interval matching).

questions.question: Among all Eminem albums, which has the highest number of ratings?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (max integer).

questions.question: Among all top 10 albums, which have between 20000 and 50000 ratings?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on a defined criteria (interval of large integer bounds).

expected_answers: Includes all 8 of 10 songs that are within that range.

questions.question: Among the top 5 albums, which 2 albums are the most similar based on genres? Why?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on similarity (reasoning).

expected_answers: 'Wish You Were Here'by Pink Floyd and 'In the Court of the Crimson King' by King Crimson. Both albums share genres such as 'Progressive Rock,' 'Psychedelic Rock,' and 'Art Rock.'
target.comment: Evaluated based on reasoning ability to see the overlap genre types.

questions.question: What is the 10th highest rated 'Alt-Pop' song?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on criterion (small double, rating).

expected_answers: I Don't Want You Anymore by Cherry Glazerr
target.comment: Small integer/floating values may provide problems for selection

questions.question: Among the 15 songs with the longest durations, what is the most popular song?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on criterion (small double, rating).

questions.question: Among the songs released in 2020, which one has the 2nd most streams?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on criterion (large integer).

questions.question: Among the most 15 streamed songs, which were released between January 2023 and Februray 2023?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on interval (date bounds)

expected_answers: Everything I Love by Morgan Wallen

questions.question: Among all Wonky albums, what album with more than 5 genres has the highest average rating?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on niche genre and on interval (more than, integer) and max. selection of record.

expected_answers: OIL OF EVERY PEARL'S UN-INSIDES by SOPHIE
Niggas on the Moon: The Powers That B Disc 1 by Death Grips

questions.question: What is the 25th most popular song?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform single-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on the last record only.

questions.question: Among the 10 longest songs, which were released by 'Eminem'?
questions.motivation: Evaluate the ability to perform multi-targeted information retrieval of a dataset based on criterion (string match).

function_sets.name: Music - functions with simple function description, no examples.

functions.name: albums_by_artist
functions.description: Returns all albums by a given artist.

functions.name: top_rated_albums
functions.description: Returns the top-rated albums based on average rating.

n.description: The number of albums to return. Default is 10.

functions.name: artist_by_album
functions.description: Returns the artist of an album by its name.

functions.name: albums_by_genres
functions.description: Retrieves a list of albums that contain any of the specified genres.

genres.description: A list of genre strings the albums must contain.

functions.name: top_streamed_songs
functions.description: Returns the n most streamed songs.

n.description: The number of top-streamed songs to return. Default is 10.

functions.name: songs_by_release_date
functions.description: Retrieves all songs released on a specific date, in a specific month, or in a specific year, based on the provided release date.

release_date.description: The release date to filter songs by. Can be in YYYY (year), YYYY-MM (year-month), or YYYY-MM-DD (specific date) format.

functions.name: songs_by_longest_duration
functions.description: Returns the top 'n' songs sorted by their duration, from longest to shortest.

n.description: The number of top songs to return, based on duration. Defaults to 10 if not specified.

functions.name: artist_by_song
functions.description: Returns the artist of the song.

functions.name: songs_by_artist
functions.description: Returns all songs by a given artist.
